casebody.data:
No. 1941,

Misc.

Richards v. United States. Albert Datz for petitioner. Solicitor General Griswold, Assistant Attorney General Wilson, Beatrice Rosenberg, and Roger A. Pauley for the United States.

C. A. 5th Cir. Certiorari denied.

The Chief Justice, Mr. Justice Brennan, and Mr. Justice Stewart are of the opinion that certiorari should be granted.
